{"id":1038522326,"question_id":2999,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"9 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1693666081,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1038522326/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check if Strings Can be Made Equal With Operations I","memory":"42 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean canBeEqual(String s1, String s2) {\n        \n        int[] arrOdd = new int[26];\n        int[] arrEven = new int[26];\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<4; i++){\n            if(i%2==0){\n                arrOdd[s1.charAt(i)-'a']++;\n                arrOdd[s2.charAt(i)-'a']--;\n            }else{\n                arrEven[s1.charAt(i)-'a']++;\n                arrEven[s2.charAt(i)-'a']--;\n            }\n                \n            \n                \n        }\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<26; i++){\n            \n            \n            \n            if(arrOdd[i]!=0 || arrEven[i]!=0)\n                return false;\n            \n        }\n        \n        return true;\n        \n    }\n    \n    // even g++ o-- d++ d--\n    // odd u++ g--\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-if-strings-can-be-made-equal-with-operations-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
